subject: Re: Cancel order
description_text:
OK no problem. Thank you for your answer.

Salvador Panissa


El El mar, 29 jul. 2025 a la(s) 12:18, General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> escribió:

> I'm sorry, I noticed that your order has been shipped, but the shipping
> notification has not been sent yet. Here is your logistics tracking link.
> https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01133487224
>
>
>
> ----------Reply to Message----------
> On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 22:44 PM Salvador Panissa<salvadorpanissa@gmail.com>
> wrote:
> But shipping costs are different, how that is managed?
>
> El mar, 29 jul 2025 a las 11:42, General and sales enquiries (<
> service@simsonn.com>) escribió:
>
>> --
> Salvador Panissa
> Hello, we can change the address for you, please let me know the correct
> address as soon as possible.
>
>
>
> ----------Reply to Message----------
> On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 22:38 PM Salvador Panissa<salvadorpanissa@gmail.com>
> wrote:
> Hi, Is it possible to cancel my order? I would like to change shipping
> order to another country so I will make another purchase.
> Waiting for your response,
> Thank your very much!
>
>
>
>
